name: Instinct Eye
description:
Welcome to a whole new world of underwater adventure! A side scrolling flappy bird style game but with a whole new twist. Collect the jewels while avoiding many obstacles in your path.

Enjoy the great graphics and fun gameplay. See if you have the skills to rank to the top.

How to play:

Simply tap on the screen to bounce your character through the obstacles.

Features:

* Stunning art
* Pleasant music
* Fun game play
* Many characters to choose from
